pages.text: You have made yourself some basic tool parts but you want to make yourself a metal tool so now you must make a smeltery.
Smelting compound clay yields reinforced brick which can be used to make the smeltery.

The smeltery is then assembled as a hollow cuboid with an open top and optionally corners. The smeltery controller must be in the bottom row in a wall. The smeltery drain and tank may be anywhere in the walls. The faucet is mounted on the smeltery drain.
